articles.title: Paytm Payments Bank yet to appoint firm for IT audit, government tells Lok Sabha - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The RBI had on March 11 barred Paytm Payments Bank from onboarding new customers and ordered it to appoint a firm to conduct a "comprehensive System Audit of its IT system"
articles.content:
Paytm Payments Bank is yet to appoint a firm to conduct an audit of its information technology (IT) systems, the finance ministry has told Parliament.
